backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, contact form tickets, and admin-only ticket updates with initialization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling all site sections and conditionally showing the admin panel based on unlock state.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable UI component showing access-denied messages with optional login or retry actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderManage: Admin panel for creating and managing orders, initializing access control, and enforcing admin permissions.
frontend/src/components/AdminOrderTracki: Admin interface for searching tracking codes and updating restoration steps and shipping status.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordPro: Modal that prompts for a hardcoded admin password and unlocks the admin section with scroll behavior on success.
frontend/src/components/AdminQuoteFormsS: Displays and manages submitted quote tickets, including loading states, error handling, and toggling ticket completion status.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: Customer contact/quote form with validation and submission, showing success messages and using a mutation to send data.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with background image, headline, feature highlights, and buttons that scroll to contact and tracking sections.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling authentication state, errors, and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/ServiceTiersSect: Shows three service tier cards with pricing and features, including a 'Most Popular' tier and a button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, quick navigation buttons, social links, and admin-gated access behavior.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Header with brand logo, responsive navigation, scroll-based styling, and admin-gated navigation handling.
frontend/src/components/TrackPackageSect: Order tracking UI that accepts a tracking code, displays progress and status, and handles tracking queries.
frontend/src/context/AdminGateContext.ts: Context provider managing admin unlock state, prompt visibility, and related actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Provides an admin-capable actor using authenticated identity without secret initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend initialization status using the admin actor.
Admin hooks for creating, updating, listing, and checking admin privileges for orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTicketQueries: Admin hooks for listing tickets and updating ticket completion status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTrackingManag: Provides React Query hooks for admins to fetch tracking state and mutate package status or restoration steps, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook for managing login, identity persistence, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit a contact form via an actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackingQueries.ts: Adds a mutation hook that fetches tracking state and order status, handling missing codes and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utilities including a square logo container.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs that respect the app’s base path by normalizing the base URL and input path.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, clearing, and manipulating URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing features, and new feature requests for an admin-gated application with quote request visibility. Includes architectural notes on password gating and secure authentication.
